availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Shadrach W. Walters (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer. Lawrence County, Kentucky, native. Son of Calvin Walters. Married to Elizabeth Litterell Walters in Johnson County, Kentucky, on April 2, 1853. Father of John C. Walters, Mahala Walters, Judith Walters, George N. Walters, Paulina Walters, and Sarah Walters. Farmer in employ of Greenville Preston in Johnson County in 1850. Farmer in Johnson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 110A.
